requirements.plaintext: Clear the hilichurl camp in Going Upon the Breeze
requirements.markdown: Clear the hilichurl camp in ◀Going Upon the Breeze▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Going_Upon_the_Breeze▷

substeps.plaintext: She will provide you with 2 Fowl. If you are missing any other ingredients, investigate the barrel to her left using your interact button to get 1 Fowl and 1 Mushroom.
substeps.markdown: She will provide you with 2 ◀Fowl▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Fowl▷. If you are missing any other ingredients, investigate the barrel to her left using your interact button to get 1 ◀Fowl▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Fowl▷ and 1 ◀Mushroom▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Mushroom▷.

substeps.plaintext: Use the campfire and pot to cook the skewers.
substeps.markdown: Use the campfire and pot to cook the skewers.

steps.plaintext: Give the Chicken-Mushroom Skewer to Lynn
